entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
